alert.note: Alert for Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 3:09PM AKST until January 20 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...COLD WIND CHILLS ON THE KLONDIKE HIGHWAY AND PERIODS OF FREEZING DRIZZLE EXPECTED FOR THE UPPER ELEVATIONS OF PRINCE OF WALES ISLAND AND NORTH OF KETCHIKAN... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a tenth of an inch or less. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Higher elevations of the road network on Prince of Wales Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather.
